    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
As the referee's whistle pierced through the chilly air of the Signal Iduna Park, the crowd's roar echoed the thrilling anticipation marking the beginning of a highly awaited fixture: Borussia Dortmund versus FC. The match kicked off with Dortmund initiating the play. It didn't take long for the first piece of drama to unfold as just 46 seconds into the game, a foul was committed by a Dortmund player. This early bout of aggression set the tone for what would be a highly physical encounter. 

FC quickly capitalized on the opportunity, setting up an indirect free-kick at the one-minute mark. However, the opportunity was fleeting as an FC player fouled, leading to a Dortmund indirect free-kick shortly after. The early minutes were characterized by frequent stoppages and interruptions, the ball going out of play repeatedly, clearing attempts, and throw-ins from both sides, indicating the palpable tension that hung over the pitch.

The first significant scoring opportunity came around the eighth minute when Dortmund managed a shot on target, forcing FC's goalkeeper into action. Yet the ball strayed out of play, gifting Dortmund a corner kick. This chance went awry as a foul committed by Dortmund shifted the advantage back to FC, manifesting yet another free-kick. The subsequent minutes saw a similar pattern of play with the ball frequently going out and a good number of throw-ins as each team vied for control.

As the first half progressed, the frequency of fouls continued to mount, a testament to the intensity of the battle on the field. Dortmund committed several fouls within intervals of a few minutes, and indirect free-kicks ensued, keeping both goalkeepers alert. At the 15th minute mark, FC managed a shot off target following an indirect free-kick, reflecting their intent and determination.

The match's alternating pace revolved around sporadic clearances, offsides, and throw-ins, painting a picture of an evenly contested first half with neither side able to establish a commanding presence. The first yellow card of the half had yet to be shown, despite the evident physicality on display.

Then, in a sudden twist of events at the 32nd minute, FC broke the deadlock. After successive shots on target and commendable offensive persistence, they managed to breach Dortmund's defense, finding the back of the net. Their goal was a well-earned reward following a structured build-up play, and it injected new life into the match. The Dortmund players realigned for the subsequent kick-off, eyes resolutely focused, but the momentum had unmistakably shifted in FC's favor.

This shift in tempo invigorated the FC squad, but also amplified Dortmund's sense of urgency. Fouls continued to punctuate the game, with both teams making it challenging for the referee to maintain control. As half-time approached, Dortmund pressed hard to level the score but faced solid defensive efforts from FC. Notably, Dortmund's persistent shots either went off target or were met by resolute clearances from FC's defenders.

As the whistle ushered in half-time, Dortmund found themselves trailing by a single goal. The interval provided a much-needed opportunity for tactical reassessment and rejuvenation for both sides.

The second half began with FC kicking off at one second past the designated start time. Dortmund immediately exhibited intent, opting for an early substitution, barely seconds into the half. This technical tweak bore fruit swiftly as Dortmund managed to equalize through a decisive goal at the one-minute mark. Their efficient break-in play rendered FC's defense vulnerable, reinstating parity and once again electrifying the crowd.

Following the goal, FC's players resumed with a kick-off, trying to regain composure. The game tempo fluctuated once more, underlined by Dortmund's determination to take the lead. Persistent fouls ensued as both teams fought for mid-field dominance, culminating in a yellow card for an FC player at the sixth minute of the second half.

Dortmund's offensive strategy seemed relentless, marked by repeated shots on and off target within the foundational minutes. They aggressively sought to establish a lead but were thwarted by FC's unyielding defense and goalkeeping prowess. As the minutes ticked away, the physicality of the game showed no signs of waning. Dortmund committed multiple fouls, responding to FC's tenacity with equally aggressive play.

Substitutions became numerous as the second half wore on. Dortmund strategically injected fresh legs to push forward, while FC sought to fortify their defensive lines and prevent another breach. By the 25th minute of the second half, another substitution on both sides added a renewed energy to the pitch.

The half also saw its rigor in unrelenting passages of play, marked by consistent clearances, throw-ins, and corner kicks showcasing both sides' defensive composure and offensive determination. Despite Dortmund's numerous attempts, including direct free-kicks and shots on target, FC's resilient defense and quick counter-clearances maintained the scoreline.

Tensions escalated towards the final moments of the match. A yellow card was issued to a Dortmund player as the referee remained strict, addressing the rising tempers and frequent fouls. Amid the flurry of action, Dortmund continued to hammer FC's defense with persistent shots on target, their eyes set on securing a late winner. The game was a spectacle of end-to-end action, both teams digging deep into their tactical reserves to tilt the balance in their favor.

In the final quarter, another substitution by FC aimed at injecting fresh stamina into their squad, underlining the tactical chess game being played by the managers. Each throw-in and clearance cumulated in rising anticipation, every shot becoming more crucial as the clock ticked closer to full-time.

Despite Dortmund's incessant attacks, the match concluded with a 1-1 draw. FC's early assertiveness which secured them the lead, and their determined defensive resilience to maintain the score post-Dortmund's equalizer in the second half were commendable. Similarly, Dortmund's unyielding spirit illustrated in their several efforts to clinch a decisive goal characterized their robust gameplay this evening.

The final whistle brought an end to a captivating match, with credits going to both sides for delivering a solid display of competitive football that enthralled the spectators till the very last second. Each side walked away with a point, a testament to their respective tactical executions and intrinsic footballing prowess. The contest, pulsating with fervor and fragmented by numerous fouls, reflected the quintessential essence of the beautiful game, leaving fans eagerly looking forward to future fixtures.
